For your security, apps from outside the Play Store require an extra step.

1. After clicking 'OK', you will be redirected to Settings.
2. Enable the permission to "Allow installation of apps from this source".
3. Return to the app and tap 'Install' again.
The app %1$s would now be installed. In a real scenario, the downloaded APK file would be opened by the Android system.
